channel.title: Jagex rocks
channel.description:
Okay, it may sound quite weird, but i think this is good for the cheating community. I have never really liked aryan, i have only made a few 100k's on it, but that was all. Now Aryan is dead the cheating community will be *more* active again, and all the noobs will be gone (No, i don't hate noobs, as long they don't post "wtf aryan doesn't work! Someone update, NOW!") we can -finally- get back to SCAR (Kaitnieks can be happy too :P)
Don't you agree? Aryan was fun, for a while. It spoiled the game in many ways. I don't like RuneScape (i was totally addicted to it, until i found kaitnieks) anymore, and i'm quite sure you too. For my part, Aryan may remain dead and moparscape has to work (Ofcourse we cheaters need an unfair advantage, dÃ»h) again. Deal?
And, if you really want to hack a game, go play Adventure Quest :D ;)
~S!ms
God, now i remember how fun SCAR was :)

item.title: Jagex rocks
item.dc:creator: @S_ms S!ms
item.description:
@S_ms wrote:

hdkilla:

Seems like everyone that hates Aryan either couldnt get it to work, or couldnt make a profit off it, thats got nothing to do with Aryan, but everything to do with the user.

I had it working, i made some profit of it. In the beginning it was fun, but then i though it sucked Too many noobs were autoing

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex rocks
item.dc:creator: @cause cause
item.description:
@cause wrote:

lol, you people. Scar is the ONLY way to cheat. THe SRL dev team worked their tails off and brought the easiest to use include EVER MADE! (sry squig, SRL owns). With the scripts now, i dont even worry about being banned! The reason Aryan was decetable because it went into the java, couple of special packets from jagex, and boom, ur spotter. Scar is human level. its like so awesome! its not even comparabol to aryan!

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex rocks
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

i dnno much about aryan because i could never get it to work but i heard that it was good. but i think it is good for the cheating community that aryan is finally dead bcuz now mayb more people will concentrate on scar and mayb make scar better.

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex rocks
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“hdkilla, post:2, topic:3009”]I personally have a different view, I started with Scar a long time ago, and then dropped cheating RS for a while, then came back a couple days before Aryan was released, now, I personally made millions only using 2 or 3 bots doing something that doesnt piss people off like the Yew problem, but in your case you only made a couple 100k’s, so I can see why it didnt appeal to you as much as me.

I dont see how everyone can go back to Scar and think its still amazing, it is, but I think it had its time and its not so much in the spotlight anymore, honestly, how can you compare making millions to making like 200k per night?[/quote]

Actually with scar you can make 300k an hour.

Yes, I did auto with aryan, yes I did make a profit with aryan, yes it was faster than scar. BUT, with SCAR, the scripts are more stable and you have ALOT LESS chance of getting banned.

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex rocks
item.dc:creator: @anony2 anony2
item.description:
@anony2 wrote:

im glad aryan is dead too…it had to happen i couldnt make any money off of it cause the scripts would keep messing up so i being lazy just said screw it and power mined and stuff for a long time but none of my guys got banned anyway…still time for SCAR and since i got a few computers il just leave one on and take the mouse off so no1 messes with it

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex rocks
item.dc:creator: @Martin Martin
item.description:
@Martin wrote:

mynameisher0:

i could never get a few mills a day cuz it sucked at the end. aryan was completely destoyed you couldnt do anything. but scar is amazing i got to lvl 71 mining no ban with stupid3000s powerminer. he got banned when i started guild mining with aryan.

OMG me too lol

item.description:
@Galook wrote:

weaselforce:

yea, i think i’m gona have to make a post about liking aryan gone too. all the cool kids are doing it

sry, not ALL the cool kids are… i havent made one yet, and until i do, all the cool kids havent(im cool, notice my lower-case letters).

but i do agree that its finally gone, I dont really like when people sell programs to people who care nothing about the code, and just want to abuse the programs and ruin it for all of the people who work hard on the programs.

item.title: Jagex rocks
item.dc:creator: @hdkilla HDKilla
item.description:
@hdkilla wrote:

I personally have a different view, I started with Scar a long time ago, and then dropped cheating RS for a while, then came back a couple days before Aryan was released, now, I personally made millions only using 2 or 3 bots doing something that doesnt piss people off like the Yew problem, but in your case you only made a couple 100k’s, so I can see why it didnt appeal to you as much as me.

I dont see how everyone can go back to Scar and think its still amazing, it is, but I think it had its time and its not so much in the spotlight anymore, honestly, how can you compare making millions to making like 200k per night?

Read full topic
